<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4f6b6ed208a15552f0eb7f27b7ca945f59f22c1d|patch 8.2.1923: Vim9: "filter" command modifier doesn't work>
patch 8.2.1923: Vim9: "filter" command modifier doesn't work

Problem:    Vim9: "filter" command modifier doesn't work.
Solution:   Check for space on char before argument. (closes #7216,
            closes #7222)

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: "filter" command modifier doesn't work. Solution: Check for space on char before argument. (closes #7216, closes #7222)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/185577e47e5004a5d08a5405a02ab6a261078e42|patch 8.2.1922: Win32: scrolling problems when part of window is off-…>
patch 8.2.1922: Win32: scrolling problems when part of window is off-screen

Problem:    Win32: scrolling doesn't work properly when part of window is
            off-screen.
Solution:   Fall back to GDI scrolling if part of the window is off-screen.
            Handle multi-monitor setup better. (Ken Takata, closes #7219)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/dcdd42a8ccb9bafd857735d694b074269f337333|patch 8.2.1921: fuzzy matching does not recognize path separators>
patch 8.2.1921: fuzzy matching does not recognize path separators

Problem:    Fuzzy matching does not recognize path separators.
Solution:   Add a bonus for slash and backslash. (Yegappan Lakshmanan,
            closes #7225)

attachments.text: Problem: Fuzzy matching does not recognize path separators. Solution: Add a bonus for slash and backslash. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #7225)
